description: Try our easy to follow Hawaiian Beef Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Pineapple,Quick & easy lunch,Avocado,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Hawaiian Beef Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan or chargrill over medium-high heat. Spray lightly with oil spray. Cook burgers for 4 minutes each side or until fully cooked through. Remove and keep warm. Add pineapple slices to pan and cook for 30 seconds each side. Remove.
Place the bread roll bases onto serving plates. Top with lettuce leaves, burger, onion, a spoonful of chutney and pineapple. Finish with avocado slices and the top of the roll. Serve.
